column5: Hi all, Got out for a couple hours yesterday and got four nice walleye. Jack wanted to make a cooking video so we did one on how we make our fish fry, fun evening.
Do you realize there's virtually no ice down here yet and you go and post a lip drooling, keyboard drowning, video.  And to boot, we stuck ramming down yesterdays turkey leftovers.  ?  Nice video.
You should have cooked a leg of lamb then....lol.
i'm eating the left overs as I type, not bad cold with tobasco either....lol. hey did you ask me to do a quad modification video a while back? I have not forgotten, just aint got round to it.

yeah Simon, i got the Yamaha Kodiak and want to use it on the back lakes this winter was looking at the GPS ram mounts for ATV's , saw some of your vids with ATV , I know you also use your sled a lot so was wondering if you had any special accessories for your ATV that are designed more for winter ice travel
A pair of these for sure. https://www.amazon.ca/Heat-Demon-215048-Clamp-Heated/dp/B00SJX4U8I   A good quality windshield is also recommended for those brutal windy days.
great video - thanks for sharing.   now i'm hungry !!
I agree, I had those installed when i purchased my quad, considering I have no windshield they are essential!   Fish fries rule!
